title: Pool of contentment
creator_credit: Richard Massingham and Central Office of Information
brief_description: Explains how a typing pool operates in a British Government Department; points out common faults on the part of officers giving dictation or sending drafts to bee typed; suggests remedies for these faults, also ways in which typists may attain greater efficiency.
